Overview of the HKPFS
Target: Candidates with strong academic backgrounds and research potential from around the world to pursue PhD studies in Hong Kong 
Fellowship: The Fellowship provides a monthly stipend (cash) of HK$27,600 (US$3,500) for three years and a conference and research-related travel allowance of HK$13,800 (US$1,760) per year for each awardee for a period of up to three years. 
 Application Procedure:
•	Step 1: Submit an initial application to the RGC through its online application system 
•	Step 2: Submit a full application through the EdUHK Admission System  
Application deadline: 1 December 2023 at 12:00 noon (Hong Kong Time)

For more information about applying for the HKPFS with EDUHK:
 https://www.eduhk.hk/gradsch/index.php/hkpfs.html. 
Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact the Graduate School at rpg@eduhk.hk.
